metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15390 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient Policy Enforcement in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to62.0.3202.62 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDNhomographs in a crafted domain name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15390` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380
chromium-browser-l10n - 62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380
chromium-chromedriver - 62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '62.0.3202.62-0ubuntu0.17.10.1380').
